settings.heading: Hello make up free days, goodbye clinical costs
settings.text:
Are you ready to enjoy the same technology used in clinics, without the price tag or hassle?

Get clinic-level results with consistent treatments from the comfort of your own home – for a fraction of the clinical cost.

settings.heading:
Micro-Infusion
Facial System
settings.code:
Quick and easy at-home facial system that “stamps” your skin with clinical-grade needles, stimulating collagen production, to smooth fine lines & wrinkles.

The invisible micro-channels infuse clinically-formulated (rejuvenating or hydra-soothing) serums directly into your skin, accelerating absorption by up to 300%.

See immediately visible results, with no downtime.

Perfect for anyone wanting a fresh, dewy glow to their skin, especially before an event or occasion.

  • Perfect before your big
    event to instantly
    enhance your skin.

  • Easy DIY facial
    performed from the
    comfort of home.

  • Increases absorption of serum
    by 300% for instant results.

  • Open the device and fill with one ampule of serum. Twist on needle head with lid to close it tight.
  • Leave the device upside down for 1-2 minutes. Wash your face well and make sure your hands are clean.
  • Once the serum has had enough time to make its way into the needles, you can take off the lid and start Micro-Infusing!
  • Start at the centre of the face and work your way outward to cover the full face. Apply any leftover serum from the device to face and neck to leave on overnight.
  • Once treatment is completed, twist the lid off and dispose safely. Apply a new sterile needle head on the device for next treatment.

  • Saves time, money &
    hassle of attending
    in-clinic treatments.

  • Quick & painless facial
    booster that’s safe with
    no downtime.

settings.heading:
Q-Rejuvalight Pro
LED Mask
settings.code:
FDA-cleared at-home LED light therapy mask utilizes a combination of 5 clinically proven wavelengths of light to treat a multitude of skin concerns, all with the one device.

  • Smooth fine line and
    wrinkles

  • Clear and prevent
    acne breakouts

  • Even skin tone and
    fade dark spots

  • Calm redness and
    reduce inflammation

  • Lift and firm
    sagging skin

  • Promote a healthy,
    glowing complexion

  • Wash and dry your face, place device comfortably over the face, securing strap around head.
  • Press the button to turn mask ON.
  • Press button again to power on treatment OR open the Qure Skincare app to customize your treatment by selecting Anti-Aging or Anti-Breakout on 5 facial areas. Once programmed, then press start.
  • Treatment will automatically turn OFF after 3 minutes. Remove device and clean with wipe. Then follow Qure All-In-One Face Serum or your regular skin care routine.

  • Backed by science
    and clinical research

  • Quick daily
    treatment

  • Personalise your own
    treatment via the app

  • Wireless & long
    battery life

settings.heading:
Q-urify
Tap Water Filter
settings.code:
The water filter device brings you simple yet impactful change that enhances your skin's natural radiance and health.

Filtered water is clinically-proven to improve skin barrier and have positive results for skin health and appearance.

Removes chlorine, metal ions and contaminants that are known to contribute to skin irritation, transepidermal water loss (TEWL), and dryness.

  • Enhances skin
    health

  • Advanced filtering
    technology

  • Enhances skincare
    absorption

  • Simply follow the instructions to install the device on your tap.
  • Find the right attachments to fit your tap or use the universal one.
  • Replace filter every 3 months.

  • Easy install
    - no need for plumber

  • Multiple attachments
    to fit most faucets

  • Wash as you usually do
    but with clean water

settings.heading:
Neck & Décolletage
LED Device
settings.code:
At home LED light therapy device that goes beyond the face for a targeted skin treatment. Utilizes a combination of infra red and near-infra red light wavelengths to treat multiple skin concerns and signs of aging on neck and chest area.

  • Reduces fine lines &
    wrinkles

  • Rejuvenates dark spots
    & sun damaged skin

  • Increases hydration
    & brightens the skin

  • Promotes healthier, younger-looking skin

  • Diminishes the appearance
    of pigmentation

  • Cleanse and dry your skin to prepare it for ultimate LED light absorption. Secure the device around your neck using the adjustable velcro straps. 
  • Press & hold to start your 10-minute treatment. With a hands-free controller & clip-on, you can either relax or go about your day. 
  • The device will automatically shut off after 10 minutes. Remove the device and gently wipe it down. Follow up with your normal skincare routine. That’s it!

  • Backed by science
    and clinical research

  • Quick daily
    treatment

settings.heading:
All-In-One
Face Serum
settings.code:
1-step multi-tasking All-In-One Face Serum effectively reduces the visibility of fine lines and dark spots, boosts firmness and smooths texture.

Treat various skin concerns without needing to buy multiple skincare products.

Argireline® Peptides, Retinol, Bakuchiol, Niacinamide, Vit C, Vit E, Ferulic Acid.

Fragrance-Free. Suitable for most skin types

  • Save money by not
    buying multiple serums

  • Boost light
    therapy results

  • After cleansing, apply 1-2 pumps onto already cleansed face and neck
  • Use every second day during the first week of use whilst your skin builds tolarence.
  • Then use daily for best results

  • Apply 1-2 pumps
    with your ring finger

  • Simple one step routine in the evening

settings.heading: Sick of wasting time and money with failed skin promises?
settings.text: Our clinical-grade treatments and skincare is scientifically-proven to change your skin, and your self-esteem, for the better.

settings.heading: Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear
settings.text:
What colour wavelengths does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro have?

The Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear has a total of 5 clinical-grade wavelengths of light for the best results:

  • Infrared light (880 nm)
  • Deep Red (660 nm)
  • Red (630 nm)
  • Amber (605 nm)
  • Blue (415 nm)

The Q-Rejuvalight Pro offers two treatment modes.
Anti-Aging Treatment: Combines red, deep red, infrared and amber wavelengths.
Anti-breakout Treatment: Combines red and blue wavelengths.

When paired with the Qure Skincare App, you can customize your treatment by programming either Anti-Aging or Anti-Breakout treatment on 5 facial zones.
settings.text2:
What type of results will I see? How quickly will I see them?

Typically you’ll see improvements in 4 to 12 weeks. It is important to take "before and after" pictures to document your progress. Results are cumulative, frequent daily treatment is the key to seeing the best results. 

Most users see a reduction of acne breakouts and redness after 2-4 weeks. Smoother lines, improved skin tone and firmness after 10-12 weeks. With continued positive results of skin improving overtime.
settings.text3:
How do you charge the Q-Rejuvalight Pro?

Every Q-Rejuvalight Pro comes with a universal USB-C charging cable. Simply plug the cable into any regular USB charger to charge your mask! Charging takes about 2-4 hours and gives you 8 to 10 full treatment sessions.
settings.text4:
Does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro come with warranty?

Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear comes with one (1) year warranty covering any manufacturer related problems resulting from everyday use of the product. Proudly designed in Australia.

settings.heading: Micro-infusion System
settings.text:
When and what kind of results can I expect with Micro-Infusion?

You’ll likely notice a radiance boost, softer fine lines and overall a healthy fresh complexion in the next day or two.

The more treatments you perform the greater skin benefits over time you’ll receive. This quick and easy home facial is perfect to perform a day or two before a big event, when you need to look to boost your skin’s complexion, fast.
settings.text2:
How often can I do the treatment?

We recommend a Micro-Infusion treatment every 2 weeks for the best results!
settings.text3:
Is it painful? Does it hurt?

Although the 0.5mm needles are longer than most at-home needling systems (making it more effective), the ultra-fine needles are thinner than a human hair, so that means you’ll feel minimal to no pain during treatment.

During the initial stages of treatment, you may experience a prickling sensation as the needles make contact with the skin but you’ll get used to the feeling quickly.
settings.text4:
How many treatments do I get out of the  Micro-Infusion 3 Month Bundle?

Total of 6 treatments. Each needle head is to be used one time per treatment, and disposed of after each treatment. This minimizes the risk of infection and unnecessary damage to the skin so you can get the best results. Use 1 full serum ampoule per treatment.
settings.text5:
What serums come in the bundle? Can I use any serum with my Micro-Infusion device?

We recommend only using the serums that come in the bundle. Some serums may cause irritation and should be avoided! We have developed our potent serum ampoules specifically for Qure’s Micro-Infusion system, with low risk of irritation and with no fragrance.

There are two types of serums that come in the bundle, you can mix them together to experience a complete set of benefits that treats your specific skin concerns.
settings.text6:
Rejuvenating Serum:

Reveals a smoother, evenly radiant complexion, generating a glow effect. Collagen-stimulating, dark spot brightening, and wrinkle-combatting properties restores youthful skin.Skin Concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, rough texture, dark spots, dryness.
settings.text7:
Hydra-Soothing Serum:

Instant, intense hydration. Effectively plumps up fine lines, reduces redness, boosts and protects the skin barrier for healthy, supple skin. Skin Concerns: Dehydration, dryness, redness, fine lines, dull skin.
settings.text8:
Is there any aftercare that I should follow post my Micro-Infusion treatment?

After you’ve infused your skin with all that skin boosting serum, try to keep the skin clean for 24 hours and follow these post treatment guidelines:

  • The day after treatment, wash your face with a gentle cleanser and apply a nourishing moisturizer.
  • Users may experience minor redness and irritation after the procedure but should quickly subside. Skin may experience mild swelling, peeling or flaking. You can minimize these effects by keeping the skin moisturized.
  • Skip makeup for as long as you can, but at minimum, at least 24 hours.
  • No exercising or strenuous activity for the first 24 hours post-treatment. Sweating and gym environments are harmful, rife with bacteria, and may cause adverse reactions.
  • Keep in mind, anything you put on your skin after using Micro-Infusion will absorb mo re easily, so it’s important to keep the skin clean and use products that don’t have harsh ingredients (no acids!).
  • Avoid touching your face, especially with dirty hands that haven’t been sanitized.
  • Avoid swimming, saunas and steam rooms for at least 24-48 hours post-treatment.
  • Avoid applying products containing fragrances, active ingredients or acids such as Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Beta Hydroxy Acid, Retinol (Vitamin A), Vitamin C or anything perceived as ‘active’ skincare including scrubs or toners for at least 2-3 days post-treatment, as it may cause irritation.
  • Avoid exfoliating products for 2-3 days after treatment because they can be abrasive on skin when it is in that kind of condition. Avoid direct sun exposure immediately after treatment. Apply a high protection sunscreen when going outdoors, and avoid prolonged sun exposure. Use good quality non-comedogenic sunscreen if going in the sun.

By the next day, you should be free to resume your normal activities, skincare routine, and any makeup you want to apply—but you may not even need it. Just ensure you monitor your skin’s reaction.

settings.heading: Q-urify Tap Water Filter
settings.text:
How does tap water harm my skin?

Facial skin is more sensitive than your skin anywhere else. Your skin barrier is like a protective shield against outside threats. But the stuff in tap water can harm it, leading to:

  • Dry and Damaged Skin: Tap water can strip away your skin's natural oils, leaving it dry and damaged.
  • Skin Irritation: It might also cause skin irritation, making it sensitive and red.
  • Premature Aging: The chemicals in tap water can even speed up the aging process, causing wrinkles and fine lines.
settings.text2:
What does it filter in the water?

Q-urify water filter uses both physical and chemical filtration components to help reduce skin irritants that make your tap water “hard” – like calcium, magnesium and chlorine.
settings.text3:
What skin types can benefit from Q-urify Water Filter?

Every skin type! Especially helpful for anyone experiencing sensitive skin, premature aging, dry skin, and acne.
settings.text4:
How often do I need to replace my filter?

With daily use, your Q-urify water filter needs to be replaced at least once every three months for your skin to look and feel its best. Once it gets past the 3 month mark, your filter starts to lose its efficacy. We wash our face everyday so make sure you are looking after your skin.
settings.text5:
Where can I buy replacement filters?

Replacement filters can be purchased on our site for 3 months of pure water. We also offer subscription plans for your convenience and ease.
settings.text6:
Will it fit my faucet?

It’s compatible with almost every circular removable aerator! Each Q-urify Water Filter kit comes with 8 adaptors to help fit different faucet sizes. Please note that it will NOT fit faucets that are square shaped, pull out, hand-held, spray-style, or faucets with a sensor.

settings.heading: Neck & Décolletage LED
settings.text:
What are the wavelengths? How many LED lights does it have? 

Two clinically proven wavelengths of light (red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm) work on a cellular level to stimulate new collagen, reduce fine lines and wrinkles, and reduce sun damage and the visible signs of aging.

LEDs: 55 Dual-core LEDs
Wavelengths: 630 nm, 830 (Red and InfraRed)
settings.text2:
How often should I use it for optimal results?

For best results, we recommend using the device 5-7 times a week. Each session only lasts 10 minutes. Visible results may vary, but improvements can be seen within 4 weeks of consistent use. More significant changes can be seen over several months.
settings.text3:
How long is the treatment?

Just 10 minutes! A one and a half hour charge can deliver up to 7 to 8 treatments.
settings.text4:
Is it safe for all skin types?

Yes, this device is safe for all skin types. It is non-invasive and gentle on the skin. However, if you have specific skin conditions, we recommend consulting with a dermatologist before use.
settings.text5:
How do I charge the device? 

Charge Neck & Décolletage device fully for 4 hours before your first use. Only use a 5V adapter or computer USB port. Please avoid fast chargers as they can damage the battery.

To charge the device, insert the USB-C cable into the controller. Insert the USB-A side of the cable into a USB power supply. When the controller is charged, the LED indicator on the controller flashes white, and when the controller is fully charged, the indicator will be steady white.

settings.heading: All-In-One Face Serum
settings.text:
What’s the full ingredients list? 

Purified Aqua, Aqua (and) Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Aqua (and) Boswellia Serrata Resin Extract, Glycerin, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, 1,3-Propanediol, Aqua (and) Sodium Hydroxide, Maltodextrin (and) Sucrose Dilaurate (and) Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate (and) Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract, Glycerin (and) Aqua (and) Artemisia Umbelliformis Extract, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer (and) Lecithin, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol (and) Caprylyl Glycol (and) Tropolone, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer (and) Lecithin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (and) Retinol (and) BHT, Retinyl Palmitate (and) Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil (and) Tocopherol, Bakuchiol, Glyceryl Oleate Citrate (and) Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Lactic Acid, Propanediol (and) Aqua (and) Ganoderma Lucidum (Mushroom) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polycrylate-13 (and) Polyisobutene (and) Polysorbate 20, Tocopheryl Acetate, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ferulic Acid, Mandelic Acid, Aqua (and) Ginkgo biloba Leaf Extract, Aqua (and) Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract.
settings.text2:
What’s the full ingredients list? 

Purified Aqua, Aqua (and) Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Aqua (and) Boswellia Serrata Resin Extract, Glycerin, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, 1,3-Propanediol, Aqua (and) Sodium Hydroxide, Maltodextrin (and) Sucrose Dilaurate (and) Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate (and) Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract, Glycerin (and) Aqua (and) Artemisia Umbelliformis Extract, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer (and) Lecithin, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol (and) Caprylyl Glycol (and) Tropolone, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer (and) Lecithin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (and) Retinol (and) BHT, Retinyl Palmitate (and) Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil (and) Tocopherol, Bakuchiol, Glyceryl Oleate Citrate (and) Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Lactic Acid, Propanediol (and) Aqua (and) Ganoderma Lucidum (Mushroom) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polycrylate-13 (and) Polyisobutene (and) Polysorbate 20, Tocopheryl Acetate, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ferulic Acid, Mandelic Acid, Aqua (and) Ginkgo biloba Leaf Extract, Aqua (and) Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract.
settings.text3:
When can I start to see results?

Most people see improvement in a couple months, but this can vary. Remember to stick with it— consistency is key. Our clinically-proven ingredients work to make your skin look brighter, instantly and over time.

settings.heading: Shipping & Orders
settings.text:
We ship FREE, worldwide on orders over $100. 

Here’s how it works for products that are in stock: you order, we process, then we ship. Processing time is 1 to 3 business days. Orders are shipped from our warehouse in the U.S then one of our carriers takes it from there. You’ll get an email with your tracking number as soon as your package is on its way!
settings.text2:
What is the estimated shipping time?

United States: 3-6 business days
Australia: 7-14 business days
Canada: 3-10 business days
United Kingdom: 7-10 business days
Europe: 7-14 business days
settings.text3:
Do I need to pay taxes and duties?

Depending on your shipping destination country, you may be liable to pay local taxes and duties on receipt of your order. We recommend contacting your local customs department to find out more.
